Bullets.Bullet: Play 50 Adventure levels through night, fog, a pool and more.
Unlock all five game modes and the Almanac.
Battle 26 types of zombies and earn 49 zombie-zapping plants.
PopCap remembers your purchase if you ever need to re-download.
